baseline.from sentence:
Results
The baseline relative to our contributions is the span - ranking model from augmented with both ELMo and hyperparameter tuning , which achieves 72.3 F1 .

Our full approach.from sentence: Our full approach achieves 73.0 F1 , setting a new state of the art for coreference resolution .

far less computation.from sentence: Despite using far less computation , it outperforms the baseline because the coarse scores s c ( i , j ) can be computed for all antecedents , enabling the model to potentially predict a coreference link between any two spans in the document .

much higher recall.from sentence: As a result , we observe a much higher recall when adopting the coarse - to - fine approach .

further improvement.from sentence: We also observe further improvement by including the second - order inference ( Section 3 ) .
